pangloss.xsl
[Groovy] Class XslFileFilterFactory

java.lang.Object
  pangloss.xsl.XslFileFilterFactory

class XslFileFilterFactory

XslFileFilterFactory handles the file filters of the file chooser dialog. There are two kinds of filters:

  • The filters genuinely embedded in the program, like the GMT filter.
  • The filters defined externally in .xsl stylesheets and discovered at runtime.
This class is inspired from XsltExportEngineFactory.java and ExportController.java of Freeplane source code.
Authors:
Stephane Aubry

Property Summary
Pattern COMPILED_EXPORT_FILTER_PATTERN

COMPILED_EXPORT_FILTER_PATTERN should match in the first lines of a valid .xsl stylesheet. // Example:

fileFilters is the complete list of file filters.

Map xslFilterMap

xslFilterMap is a map of file filters defined externally in .xsl stylesheets.

Property Detail

COMPILED_EXPORT_FILTER_PATTERN

Pattern COMPILED_EXPORT_FILTER_PATTERN
COMPILED_EXPORT_FILTER_PATTERN should match in the first lines of a valid .xsl stylesheet. // Example:

fileFilters

List fileFilters
fileFilters is the complete list of file filters. It contains both internal and external filters.

xslFilterMap

Map xslFilterMap
xslFilterMap is a map of file filters defined externally in .xsl stylesheets. Keys of the map entries are filters. Values of the map entries are the stylesheet files.

 
Constructor Detail

XslFileFilterFactory

XslFileFilterFactory()
Creates the factory and define the filters genuinely embedded in the program, like the GMT filter.
Returns:
The new XslFileFilterFactory object.

 
Method Detail

addXsltFile

void addXsltFile(List extensions, String description, File xslFile)
Adds an externally defined filter.
Parameters:
extensions - The semicolon separated list of file extensions (without the period character) supported by the filter. Example: 'csv;tsv'
description - A string describing the filter. Example: '2-col Spreadsheet'
xslFile - The xsl stylesheet implementing the filter transformation from the GMT format.

extractFilterFromFile

void extractFilterFromFile(File xsltFile)
Checks if the COMPILED_EXPORT_FILTER_PATTERN match within the first 5 lines of the file.
Parameters:
xsltFile - The file where the pattern is to be searched for.

gatherXsltScripts

private void gatherXsltScripts(File xsltDir)
Checks all readable files ending in '.xsl' from a given directory, and passes them to the method extractFilterFromFile.
Parameters:
xsltDir - The directory where xsl stylesheet files are to be searched for.

getFileFilters

List getFileFilters()
Returns fileFilters, the complete list of file filters, containing both internal and external filters.
Returns:
The fileFilters list.

getFilterMap

HashMap getFilterMap()
Returns xslFilterMap, a map of file filters defined externally in .xsl stylesheets. Keys of the map entries are filters. Values of the map entries are the stylesheet files.
Returns:
The xslFilterMap map.
